globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https: data: 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src 'self' https:; img-src 'self' https: data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https: fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https: fonts.gstatic.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; object-src 'none';
